snippet: Mr. Nolan, the filmmaker behind blockbuster hits like "Inception" and "The Dark Knight Rises," will discuss his career and revisit clips from his movies at a Nov. 28 event.
abstract: Mr. Nolan, the filmmaker behind blockbuster hits like "Inception" and "The Dark Knight Rises," will discuss his career and revisit clips from his movies at a Nov. 28 event.

headline.main: Film Society of Lincoln Center Offers an Evening With Christopher Nolan
headline.print_headline: A Film Society Evening With Christopher Nolan
